public interface Character

Represents a character

boolean addSkillPoints(Skill skill,
                       int amount)
Adds skill points to the given skill from the character's skill points

Parameters:

amount - the amount to assign to the skill
Returns:

isDead

boolean isDead()
Gets whether the character is dead or not

Returns:
true if the character is dead, otherwise false

setDead

void setDead(boolean dead)
Sets whether the character is dead or not

Parameters:
dead - whether the character should be dead or not. Use false for resurrections and true when the character is killed.
